title: Proxmox VE LXC Filesystem Trim
textContent:
Proxmox VE LXC Filesystem Trim 
                This maintains SSD performance by managing unused blocks. Thin-provisioned storage systems also require
                management to prevent unnecessary storage use. VMs automate fstrim, while LXC containers need manual or
                automated fstrim processes for optimal performance.
                This is designed to work with SSDs on ext4 filesystems only. More Info
                Run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/fstrim.sh)"
outerHTML:
Proxmox VE LXC Filesystem Trim

This maintains SSD performance by managing unused blocks. Thin-provisioned storage systems also require management to prevent unnecessary storage use. VMs automate fstrim, while LXC containers need manual or automated fstrim processes for optimal performance.

This is designed to work with SSDs on ext4 filesystems only. More Info

Run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/misc/fstrim.sh)"
